SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_DATE, POST_UPDATE, MEMBER_NUMBER FROM TBL_POST WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRow} AND #{pagination.endRow}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT SP.SELL_POST_NUMBER, SP.SELL_POST_TITLE, SP.SELL_POST_CONTENT, SP.PRICE_POINT, SP.TRADING_AREA, SP.SELL_POST_CREATION_DATE, M.MEMBER_ID AS Buyer_ID, TS.STATUS_NAME FROM TBL_SELL_POST SP JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON SP.MEMBER_NUMBER = M.MEMBER_NUMBER JOIN TBL_TRADE_POST TP ON SP.SELL_POST_NUMBER = TP.SELL_POST_NUMBER JOIN TBL_TRADE_STATUS TS ON TP.STATUS_NUMBER = TS.STATUS_ID WHERE TS.STATUS_ID = 'SELL' AND M.MEMBER_NUMBER = #{memberNumber} ORDER BY SP.SELL_POST_CREATION_DATE DESC ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startRow} AND #{pagination.endRow}
